Probable coalitions

The likelihood of parties being in the next government.

Which of the main parties is most likely to form a government after the next election?

And what chance do the smaller parties have of participating in government after May 7th?

A full break down of probable coalitions.
CoalitionProbability
Labour majority2.2%
Labour/Left Minority1.8%
Labour/SNP17%
Labour/SNP/Left Minority10.3%
All left0.1%
Labour/SNP/Lib Dem16.2%
Labour/Lib Dem17.1%
Labour/Lib Dem/Left Minority8.9%
Conservative/Lib Dem8.2%
Conservative/Lib Dem/DUP12.7%
Conservative/DUP1.9%
Conservative/DUP/UKIP2.4%
Conservative majority1.3%

According to analysis by Populus/Hanover.
